GS38kautil_u:471: KAZ01.14.11ab/ tathā^iti pratipannāṃs tān saṃhitān paṇa.karmaṇā /

GS38kautil_u:505: KAZ01.15.23/ “etan mantra.jñānam, na^etan mantra.rakṣaṇam” iti pārāśarāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:506: KAZ01.15.24/ “yad asya kāryam abhipretaṃ tat.pratirūpakaṃ mantriṇaḥ pṛcchet - “kāryam idam evam āsīt, evaṃ vā yadi bhavet, tat kathaṃ kartavyam” iti //
GS38kautil_u:507: KAZ01.15.25/ te yathā brūyus tat kuryāt //

GS38kautil_u:510: KAZ01.15.28/ “mantriṇo hi vyavahitam arthaṃ vṛttam avṛttaṃ vā pṛṣṭā anādareṇa bruvanti prakāśayanti vā //
GS38kautil_u:512: KAZ01.15.30/ tasmāt karmasu ye yeṣv abhipretās taiḥ saha mantrayeta //

GS38kautil_u:516: KAZ01.15.34/ mantribhis tribhiś caturbhir vā saha mantrayeta //

GS38kautil_u:518: KAZ01.15.36/ ekaś ca mantrī yathā.iṣṭam anavagrahaś carati //

GS38kautil_u:528: KAZ01.15.43/ tān ekaikaśaḥ pṛcchet samastāṃś ca //

GS38kautil_u:567: KAZ01.16.13/ taṃ brūyāt - “dūta.mukhā hi rājānaḥ, tvaṃ ca^anye ca //

GS38kautil_u:651: “aprārthanīyo rājā, vipanne ghātaḥ, sampanne naraka.pātaḥ, saṃkrośaḥ,
GS38kautil_u:655: KAZ01.17.42/ bahu.putraḥ pratyantam anya.viṣayaṃ vā preṣayed yatra garbhaḥ paṇyaṃ ḍimbo vā na bhavet //

GS38kautil_u:664: KAZ01.17.51/ na ca^eka.putram avinītaṃ rājye sthāpayet //

GS38kautil_u:669: (ṭhe conduct of a prince in disfavour)
GS38kautil_u:671: KAZ01.18.01/ vinīto rāja.putraḥ kṛcchra.vṛttir asadṛśe karmaṇi niyuktaḥ
GS38kautil_u:673: KAZ01.18.02/ puṇye karmaṇi niyuktaḥ puruṣam adhiṣṭhātāraṃ yācet //
GS38kautil_u:674: KAZ01.18.03/ puruṣa.adhiṣṭhitaś ca saviśeṣam ādeśam anutiṣṭhet //
GS38kautil_u:675: KAZ01.18.04/ abhirūpaṃ ca karma.phalam aupāyanikaṃ ca lābhaṃ pitur upanāyayet //
GS38kautil_u:676: KAZ01.18.05/ tathā^apy atuṣyantam anyasmin putre dāreṣu vā snihyantam
GS38kautil_u:678: KAZ01.18.06/ bandha.vadha.bhayād vā yaḥ sāmanto nyāya.vṛttir dhārmikaḥ
GS38kautil_u:679: satya.vāg.avisaṃvādakaḥ pratigrahītā mānayitā ca^abhipannānāṃ tam āśrayeta //
GS38kautil_u:685: āḍhya.vidhavā.dravyaṃ vā gūḍham anupraviśya sārtha.yāna.pātrāṇi ca
GS38kautil_u:690: vā naṣṭa.rūpas tad.vyañjana.sakhaś.chidreṣu praviśya rājñaḥ śastra.rasābhyāṃ prahṛtya brūyāt - “aham asau kumāraḥ, saha.bhogyam idaṃ
GS38kautil_u:691: rājyam, eko na^arhati bhoktum, ye kāmayante māṃ bhartuṃ tān ahaṃ dviguṇena
GS38kautil_u:696: KAZ01.18.15/ atyaktaṃ tulya.śīlābhiḥ strībhiḥ pānena mṛgayayā vā prasañjayitvā rātrāv upagṛhya^ānayeyuḥ
GS38kautil_u:697: KAZ01.18.16ab/ upasthitaṃ ca rājyena mad.ūrdhvam iti sāntvayet /
GS38kautil_u:698: KAZ01.18.16cd/ ekastham atha samrundhyāt putravāṃs tu pravāsayet //E
GS38kautil_u:705: KAZ01.19.06/ nālikābhir ahar aṣṭadhā rātriṃ ca vibhajet, chāyā.pramāṇena
GS38kautil_u:707: KAZ01.19.07/ tripauruṣī pauruṣī catur.aṅgulā naṣṭac.chāyo madhya.ahna^iti
GS38kautil_u:710: KAZ01.19.09/ tatra pūrve divasasya^aṣṭa.bhāge rakṣā.vidhānam āya.vyayau ca śṛṇuyāt //
GS38kautil_u:712: KAZ01.19.11/ tṛtīye snāna.bhojanaṃ seveta, svādhyāyaṃ ca kurvīta //
GS38kautil_u:713: KAZ01.19.12/ caturthe hiraṇya.pratigraham adhyakṣāṃś ca kurvīta //
GS38kautil_u:716: KAZ01.19.14/ ṣaṣṭhe svaira.vihāraṃ mantraṃ vā seveta //
GS38kautil_u:721: KAZ01.19.19/ dvitīye snāna.bhojanaṃ kurvīta, svādhyāyaṃ ca //
GS38kautil_u:722: KAZ01.19.20/ tṛtīye tūrya.ghoṣeṇa saṃviṣṭaś caturtha.pañcamau śayīta //

GS38kautil_u:3379: KAZ03.10.23/ bhakṣayitvā niṣaṇṇānām eta eva dvi.guṇā daṇḍāḥ, parivasatāṃ

GS38kautil_u:3383: KAZ03.10.25/ sasya.bhakṣaṇe sasya.upaghātaṃ niṣpattitaḥ parisaṃkhyāya dvi.guṇaṃ dāpayet

GS38kautil_u:3388: KAZ03.10.29/ vāṭa.bhede dvi.guṇaḥ veśma.khala.valaya.gatānāṃ ca dhānyānāṃ bhakṣaṇe //

GS38kautil_u:3393: KAZ03.10.34/ prārthayamānā dṛṣṭa.aparādhā vā sarva.upāyair niyantavyāḥ //

GS38kautil_u:3397: pratyaṃśa.dvi.guṇam, bhakṣya.peya.adāne ca prahavaṇeṣu dvi.guṇam aṃśaṃ dadyāt //
GS38kautil_u:3398: KAZ03.10.37/ prekṣāyām anaṃśadaḥ, sa-sva.jano na prekṣeta //
GS38kautil_u:3399: KAZ03.10.38/ pracchanna.śravaṇa.īkṣaṇe ca sarva.hite ca karmaṇi nigraheṇa

GS38kautil_u:3412: KAZ03.11.01/ sapāda.paṇā dharmyā māsa.vṛddhiḥ paṇa.śatasya, pañca.paṇā
GS38kautil_u:3414: KAZ03.11.02/ tataḥ paraṃ kartuḥ kārayituś ca pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ,
GS38kautil_u:3416: KAZ03.11.03/ rājany ayoga.kṣema.āvahe tu dhanika.dhāraṇikayoś caritram avekṣeta //
GS38kautil_u:3417: KAZ03.11.04/ dhānya.vṛddhiḥ sasya.niṣpattāv upārdhā, paraṃ mūlya.kṛtā
GS38kautil_u:3419: KAZ03.11.05/ prakṣepa.vṛddhir udayād ardhaṃ samnidhāna.sannā vārṣikī deyā //
GS38kautil_u:3420: KAZ03.11.06/ cira.pravāsaḥ stambha.praviṣṭo vā mūlya.dvi.guṇaṃ dadyāt //

GS38kautil_u:3424: KAZ03.11.09/ tasya tri.bhāgam ādātā dadyāt, śeṣaṃ pradātā //

GS38kautil_u:3431: KAZ03.11.14/ pretasya putrāḥ kusīdaṃ dadyuḥ, dāyādā vā riktha.harāḥ,
GS38kautil_u:3435: KAZ03.11.17/ asaṃkhyāta.deśa.kālaṃ tu putrāḥ pautrā dāyādā vā rikthaṃ
GS38kautil_u:3437: KAZ03.11.18/ jīvita.vivāha.bhūmi.prātibhāvyam asaṃkhyāta.deśa.kālaṃ tu putrāḥ pautrā vā vaheyuḥ
GS38kautil_u:3438: KAZ03.11.19/ nānā^ṛṇa.samavāye tu na^ekaṃ dvau yugapad abhivadeyātām,
GS38kautil_u:3440: KAZ03.11.20/ tatra^api gṛhīta.ānupūrvyā rāja.śrotriya.dravyaṃ vā pūrvaṃ pratipādayet //
GS38kautil_u:3443: KAZ03.11.22/ agrāhyāḥ karma.kāleṣu karṣakā rāja.puruṣāś ca //
GS38kautil_u:3444: KAZ03.11.23/ strī ca^apratiśrāviṇī pati.kṛtam ṛṇam, anyatra
GS38kautil_u:3446: KAZ03.11.24/ patis tu grāhyaḥ strī.kṛtam ṛṇam, aprati.vidhāya proṣita iti //
GS38kautil_u:3448: KAZ03.11.26/ asmapratipattau tu sākṣiṇaḥ pramāṇaṃ prātyayikāḥ śucayo^anumatā vā trayo^avara.ardhyāḥ

GS38kautil_u:3464: KAZ03.11.35/ tatra brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāt “satyaṃ brūhi” iti //
GS38kautil_u:3465: KAZ03.11.36/ rājanyaṃ vaiśyaṃ vā “mā tava^iṣṭā.pūrta.phalam, kapāla.hastaḥ

GS38kautil_u:3468: paścād api jñāyeta yathā.dṛṣṭa.śrutam, eka.mantrāḥ satyam upaharata” iti
GS38kautil_u:3469: KAZ03.11.38/ anupaharatāṃ sapta.rātrād ūrdhvaṃ dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,
GS38kautil_u:3471: KAZ03.11.39/ sākṣi.bhede yato bahavaḥ śucayo^anumatā vā tato niyaccheyuḥ,
GS38kautil_u:3473: KAZ03.11.40/ tad vā dravyaṃ rājā haret //
GS38kautil_u:3474: KAZ03.11.41/ sākṣiṇaś ced abhiyogād ūnaṃ brūyur atiriktasya^abhiyoktā
GS38kautil_u:3476: KAZ03.11.42/ atiriktaṃ vā brūyus tad.atiriktaṃ rājā haret //

GS38kautil_u:3480: KAZ03.11.45/ “kūṭa.sākṣiṇo yam artham abhūtaṃ kuryur bhūtaṃ vā nāśayeyus tad daśa.guṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyuḥ” iti mānavāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:3481: KAZ03.11.46/ “bāliśyād vā visaṃvādayatāṃ citro ghātaḥ” iti bārhaspatyāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:3484: KAZ03.11.49/ aśṛṇvatāṃ catur.viṃśati.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, tato^ardham abruvāṇānām

GS38kautil_u:3491: grāma.madhya.agny.udaka.ābādhe jvālā.vega.uparuddhe vā, nāvi nimagnāyāṃ muṣitāyāṃ vā svayam uparūḍho na^upanidhim abhyāvahet //

GS38kautil_u:3516: KAZ03.12.20/ antare vā mṛtasya dāyādo^api na^abhyāvahet //

GS38kautil_u:3530: bhreṣa.upanipātābhyāṃ naṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vā mūlyam api na dadyuḥ //
GS38kautil_u:3532: mūlyam udayaṃ ca dadyuḥ, paṇya.samavāyānāṃ ca pratyaṃśam //

GS38kautil_u:3545: KAZ03.12.40/ tasya pratideśena putro bhrātā vā^abhigamya nikṣepaṃ yāceta //
GS38kautil_u:3546: KAZ03.12.41/ dāne śuciḥ, anyathā nikṣepaṃ steya.daṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt //

GS38kautil_u:3550: KAZ03.12.44/ dāne śuciḥ, anyathā nikṣepaṃ steya.daṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt //
GS38kautil_u:3551: KAZ03.12.45/ kṛta.lakṣaṇena vā dravyeṇa pratyānayed enam //

GS38kautil_u:3564: vikraya.ādhānaṃ nayataḥ sva.janasya dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, vaiśyaṃ
GS38kautil_u:3568: KAZ03.13.03/ mlecchānām adoṣaḥ prajāṃ vikretum ādhātuṃ vā //
GS38kautil_u:3570: KAZ03.13.05/ athavā^āryam ādhāya kula.bandhana āryāṇām āpadi, niṣkrayaṃ
GS38kautil_u:3571: ca^adhigamya bālaṃ sāhāyya.dātāraṃ vā pūrvaṃ niṣkrīṇīran //
GS38kautil_u:3572: KAZ03.13.06/ sakṛd.ātma.ādhātā niṣpatitaḥ sīdet, dvir anyena^āhitakaḥ,
GS38kautil_u:3580: KAZ03.13.11/ dhātrīm āhitikāṃ vā^akāmāṃ sva.vaśāṃ gacchataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, para.vaśāṃ madhyamaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:3581: KAZ03.13.12/ kanyām āhitikāṃ vā svayam anyena vā duṣayato mūlya.nāśaḥ
GS38kautil_u:3584: KAZ03.13.14/ ātma.adhigataṃ svāmi.karma.aviruddhaṃ labheta, pitryaṃ ca dāyam //
GS38kautil_u:3591_0: KAZ03.13.20 / gṛhe.jāta.dāya.āgata.labdha.krītānām anyatamaṃ dāsam ūna.aṣṭa.varṣaṃ vibandhum akāmaṃ nīce karmaṇi videśe dāsīṃ
GS38kautil_u:3591_1: vā sagarbhām aprativihita.garbha.bharmaṇyāṃ vikraya.ādhānaṃ nayataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, kretṛ.śrotṛṛṇāṃ ca //
GS38kautil_u:3592: KAZ03.13.21/ dāsam anurūpeṇa niṣkrayeṇa^āryam akurvato dvādaśa.paṇo
GS38kautil_u:3594: KAZ03.13.22/ dāsa.dravyasya jñātayo dāyādāḥ, teṣām abhāve svāmī //
GS38kautil_u:3595: KAZ03.13.23/ svāminaḥ svasyāṃ dāsyāṃ jātaṃ samātṛkam adāsaṃ vidyāt //
GS38kautil_u:3596: KAZ03.13.24/ gṛhyā cet kuṭumba.artha.cintanī mātā bhrātā bhaginī ca^asyā
GS38kautil_u:3598: KAZ03.13.25/ dāsaṃ dāsīṃ vā niṣkrīya punar vikraya.ādhānaṃ nayato
GS38kautil_u:3599: dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, anyatra svayaṃ.vādibhyaḥ // iti dāsa.kalpaḥ /
GS38kautil_u:3603: KAZ03.13.28/ karṣakaḥ sasyānāṃ go.pālakaḥ sarpiṣāṃ vaidehakaḥ paṇyānām
GS38kautil_u:3607: āśā.kārika.vargas tu yathā^anyas tad.vidhaḥ kuryād yathā vā kuśalāḥ kalpayeyus tathā vetanaṃ labheta //
GS38kautil_u:3609: KAZ03.13.32/ sākṣiṇām abhāve yataḥ karma tato^anuyuñjīta //
GS38kautil_u:3610: KAZ03.13.33/ vetana.ādāne daśa.bandho daṇḍaḥ, ṣaṭ.paṇo vā //
GS38kautil_u:3611: KAZ03.13.34/ apavyayamāne dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, pañca.bandho vā //
GS38kautil_u:3617: KAZ03.13.37cd/ atiyācnā tu jīyeta daurmatya.avinayena vā //E
GS38kautil_u:3620: KAZ03.14.01/ gṛhītvā vetanaṃ karma^akurvato bhṛtakasya dvādaśa.paṇo
GS38kautil_u:3622: KAZ03.14.02/ aśaktaḥ kutsite karmaṇi vyādhau vyasane vā^anuśayaṃ labheta,
GS38kautil_u:3624: KAZ03.14.03/ tasya.vyaya.karmaṇā labheta bhartā vā kārayitum //
GS38kautil_u:3625: KAZ03.14.04/ “na^anyas tvayā kārayitavyo, mayā vā na^anyasya kartavyam”
GS38kautil_u:3626: ity avarodhe bhartur akārayato bhṛtakasya^akurvato vā dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ
GS38kautil_u:3627: KAZ03.14.05/ karma.niṣṭhāpane bhartur anyatra gṛhīta.vetano na^asakāmaḥ
GS38kautil_u:3629: KAZ03.14.06/ “upasthitam akārayataḥ kṛtam eva vidyād” ity ācāryāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:3632: KAZ03.14.09/ sa ced alpam api kārayitvā na kārayet kṛtam eva^asya vidyāt
GS38kautil_u:3633: KAZ03.14.10/ deśa.kāla.atipātanena karmaṇām anyathā.karaṇe vā na^asakāmaḥ
GS38kautil_u:3635: KAZ03.14.11/ sambhāṣitād adhika.kriyāyāṃ prayāsaṃ na moghaṃ kuryāt //
GS38kautil_u:3639: KAZ03.14.15/ na ca^anivedya bhartuḥ saṃghaḥ kaṃcit parihared upanayed vā
GS38kautil_u:3647: KAZ03.14.21/ saṃsiddhe tu^uddhṛta.paṇye sannasya tadānīm eva pratyaṃśaṃ dadyuḥ //
GS38kautil_u:3648: KAZ03.14.22/ sāmānyā hi pathi.siddhiś ca^asiddhiś ca //
GS38kautil_u:3649: KAZ03.14.23/ prakrānte tu karmaṇi svasthasya^apakrāmato dvādaśa.paṇo
GS38kautil_u:3652: KAZ03.14.25/ coraṃ tv abhaya.pūrvaṃ karmaṇaḥ pratyaṃśena grāhayed, dadyāt pratyaṃśam abhayaṃ ca //
GS38kautil_u:3655: KAZ03.14.28/ yājakāḥ svā.pracāra.dravya.varjaṃ yathā.sambhāṣitaṃ vetanaṃ samaṃ vā vibhajeran
GS38kautil_u:3656: KAZ03.14.29/ agniṣṭoma.ādiṣu ca kratuṣu dīkṣaṇād ūrdhvaṃ tṛtīyam aṃśaṃ,
GS38kautil_u:3657: madhyama.upasada ūrdhvam ardham aṃśaṃ, sutye prātaḥ.savanād ūrdhvaṃ
GS38kautil_u:3659: KAZ03.14.30/ mādhyandināt savanād ūrdhvaṃ samagram aṃśaṃ labheta //
GS38kautil_u:3661: KAZ03.14.32/ bṛhaspati.sava.varjaṃ pratisavanaṃ hi dakṣiṇā dīyante //
GS38kautil_u:3663: KAZ03.14.34/ sanānām ā.daśa.aho.rātrāt^śeṣa.bhṛtāḥ karma kuryuḥ, anye vā sva.pratyayāḥ
GS38kautil_u:3664: KAZ03.14.35/ karmaṇy asamāpte tu yajamānaḥ sīded, ṛtvijaḥ karma samāpayya
GS38kautil_u:3666: KAZ03.14.36/ asamāpte tu karmaṇi yājyaṃ yājakaṃ vā tyajataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ //

GS38kautil_u:4850: iti na kuryāḥ, pakṣaṃ vṛttiṃ guhyaṃ ca me na^upahanyāḥ, saṃjñayā ca tvāṃ
GS38kautil_u:4852: KAZ05.4.08/ ādiṣṭaḥ pradiṣṭāyāṃ bhūmāv anujñātaḥ praviśet, upaviśec ca pārśvataḥ saṃnikṛṣṭa.viprakṛṣṭaḥ para.āsanam //
GS38kautil_u:4853: KAZ05.4.09/ vigṛhya kathanam asabhyam apratyakṣam aśraddheyam anṛtaṃ ca vākyam uccair anarmaṇi hāsaṃ vāta.ṣṭhīvane ca śabdavatī na kuryāt //
GS38kautil_u:4854: KAZ05.4.10/ mithaḥ kathanam anyena, jana.vāde dvandva.kathanam, rājño veṣam uddhata.kuhakānāṃ ca, ratna.atiśaya.prakāśa.abhyarthanam,
GS38kautil_u:4859: KAZ05.4.11ab/ ahīna.kālaṃ rāja.arthaṃ sva.arthaṃ priya.hitaiḥ saha /
GS38kautil_u:4860: KAZ05.4.11cd/ para.arthaṃ deśa.kāle ca brūyād dharma.artha.saṃhitam //
GS38kautil_u:4861: KAZ05.4.12ab/ pṛṣṭaḥ priya.hitaṃ brūyān na brūyād ahitaṃ priyam /
GS38kautil_u:4862: KAZ05.4.12cd/ apriyaṃ vā hitaṃ brūyāt^śṛṇvato^anumato mithaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:4863: KAZ05.4.13ab/ tūṣṇīṃ vā prativākye syād veṣya.ādīṃś ca na varṇayet /
GS38kautil_u:4864: KAZ05.4.13cd/ apriyā api dakṣāḥ syus tad.bhāvād ye bahiṣ.kṛtāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:4865: KAZ05.4.14ab/ anarthyāś ca priyā dṛṣṭāś citta.jñāna.anuvartinaḥ /
GS38kautil_u:4866: KAZ05.4.14cd/ abhihāsyeṣv abhihased ghora.hāsāṃś ca varjayet //E
GS38kautil_u:4867: KAZ05.4.15ab/ parāt saṃkrāmayed ghoraṃ na ca ghoraṃ pare vadet /
GS38kautil_u:4869: KAZ05.4.16ab/ ātma.rakṣā hi satataṃ pūrvaṃ kāryā vijānatā /
GS38kautil_u:4870: KAZ05.4.16cd/ agnāv iva hi saṃproktā vṛttī rājā^upajīvinām //
GS38kautil_u:4871: KAZ05.4.17ab/ eka.deśaṃ dahed agniḥ śarīraṃ vā paraṃ gataḥ /
GS38kautil_u:4872: KAZ05.4.17cd/ sa-putra.dāraṃ rājā tu ghātayed ardhayeta vā //E
GS38kautil_u:4874: KAZ05.5.01/ niyuktaḥ karmasu vyaya.viśuddham udayaṃ darśayet //
GS38kautil_u:4875: KAZ05.5.02/ ābhyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ guhyaṃ prakāśyam ātyayikam upekṣitavyaṃ vā kāryaṃ “idam evam” iti viśeṣayec ca //
GS38kautil_u:4876: KAZ05.5.03/ mṛgayā.dyūta.madya.strīṣu prasaktaṃ na^enam anuvarteta praśaṃsābhiḥ //
GS38kautil_u:4882: KAZ05.5.07/ darśane prasīdati, vākyaṃ pratigṛhṇāti, āsanaṃ dadāti, vivikto
GS38kautil_u:4883: darśayate, śaṅkā.sthāne na^atiśaṅkate, kathāyāṃ ramate, parijñāpyeṣv
GS38kautil_u:4884: avekṣate, pathyam uktaṃ sahate, smayamāno niyuṅkte, hastena spṛśati,
GS38kautil_u:4885: ślāghye na^upahasati, parokṣaṃ guṇaṃ bravīti, bhakṣyeṣu smarati, saha vihāraṃ yāti, vyasane^abhyupapadyate, tad.bhaktīn pūjayati, guhyam ācaṣṭe,
GS38kautil_u:4886: mānaṃ vardhayati, arthaṃ karoti, anarthaṃ pratihanti - iti tuṣṭa.jñānam //
GS38kautil_u:4887: KAZ05.5.08/ etad eva viparītam atuṣṭasya, bhūyaś ca vakṣyāmaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:4897: KAZ05.5.11/ “ayam uccaiḥ siñcati” iti kātyāyanaḥ pravavrāja,
GS38kautil_u:4898: “krauñco^apasavyam” iti kaṇiṅko bhāradvājaḥ, “tṛṇam” iti dīrghaś cārāyaṇaḥ, “śītā śāṭī” iti ghoṭa.mukhaḥ, “hastī pratyaukṣīt” iti
GS38kautil_u:4899: kiñjalkaḥ, “ratha.aśvaṃ prāśaṃsīt” iti piśunaḥ, prati.ravaṇe śunaḥ
GS38kautil_u:4902: KAZ05.5.13/ svāmi.śīlam ātmanaś ca kilbiṣam upalabhya vā pratikurvīta //
GS38kautil_u:4904: KAZ05.5.15ab/ tatrastho doṣa.nirghātaṃ mitrair bhartari ca^ācaret /
GS38kautil_u:4905: KAZ05.5.15cd/ tato bhartari jīve vā mṛte vā punar āvrajet //E
GS38kautil_u:4909: KAZ05.6.02/ prāg eva maraṇa.ābādha.bhayād rājñaḥ priya.hita.upagraheṇa
GS38kautil_u:4911: āyuṣyaṃ putrīyaṃ vā karma rājā sādhayati” ity apadeśena //
GS38kautil_u:4914: KAZ05.6.04/ taiś ca yathā.ucitāṃ saṃbhāṣām amātya.mukho gacchet //
GS38kautil_u:4917: KAZ05.6.06/ apakāriṣu ca heḍaṃ prasādaṃ vā prakṛti.kāntaṃ darśayet,
GS38kautil_u:4921: KAZ05.6.08/ yaś ca mukhyaḥ pakṣavān durga.aṭavīstho vā vaiguṇyaṃ bhajeta
GS38kautil_u:4923: KAZ05.6.09/ bahv.ābādhaṃ vā yātrāṃ preṣayet, mitra.kulaṃ vā //
GS38kautil_u:4924: KAZ05.6.10/ yasmāc ca sāmantād ābādhaṃ paśyet tam
GS38kautil_u:4930: KAZ05.6.14/ kulya.kumāra.mukhya.upagrahaṃ kṛtvā vā kumāram abhiṣiktam eva darśayet //
GS38kautil_u:4931: KAZ05.6.15/ dāṇḍa.karmikavad vā rājya.kaṇṭakān uddhṛtya rājyaṃ kārayet //
GS38kautil_u:4932: KAZ05.6.16/ yadi vā kaścin mukhyaḥ sāmanta.ādīnām anyatamaḥ kopaṃ bhajeta
GS38kautil_u:4933: taṃ “ehi, rājānaṃ tvā kariṣyāmi” ity āvāhayitvā ghātayet //
GS38kautil_u:4935: KAZ05.6.18/ yuva.rāje vā krameṇa rājya.bhāram āropya rāja.vyasanaṃ
GS38kautil_u:4937: KAZ05.6.19/ para.bhūmau rāja.vyasane mitreṇa^amitra.vyañjanena śatroḥ saṃdhim avasthāpya^apagacchet
GS38kautil_u:4938: KAZ05.6.20/ sāmanta.ādīnām anyatamaṃ vā^asya durge sthāpayitvā^apagacchet
GS38kautil_u:4940: KAZ05.6.22/ pareṇa^abhiyukto vā yathā.uktam āpat.pratīkāraṃ kuryāt //
GS38kautil_u:4941: KAZ05.6.23/ evam eka.aiśvaryam amātyaḥ kārayed iti kauṭilyaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:4946: KAZ05.6.27/ kulya.kumāra.mukhyān upāṃśu.daṇḍena vā sādhayitvā svayaṃ
GS38kautil_u:4948: KAZ05.6.28/ rājya.kāraṇādd hi pitā putrān putrāś ca pitaram abhidruhyanti,
GS38kautil_u:4949: kim aṅga punar amātya.prakṛtir hy eka.pragraho rājyasya //
GS38kautil_u:4951: KAZ05.6.30/ “svayam ārūḍhā hi strī tyajyamānā^abhiśapati” iti
GS38kautil_u:4953: KAZ05.6.31ab/ kālaś ca sakṛd abhyeti yaṃ naraṃ kāla.kāṅkṣiṇam /
GS38kautil_u:4954: KAZ05.6.31cd/ durlabhaḥ sa punas tasya kālaḥ karma cikīrṣataḥ //
GS38kautil_u:4955: KAZ05.6.32/ prakṛti.kopakam adharmiṣṭham anaikāntikaṃ ca^etad iti kauṭilyaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:4957: KAZ05.6.34/ saṃpanna.abhāve^avyasaninaṃ kumāraṃ rāja.kanyāṃ garbhiṇīṃ devīṃ vā puras.kṛtya mahā.mātrān saṃnipātya brūyāt “ayaṃ vo nikṣepaḥ,
GS38kautil_u:4958: pitaram asya^avekṣadhvaṃ sattva.abhijanam ātmanaś ca, dhvaja.mātro^ayaṃ
GS38kautil_u:4959: bhavanta eva svāminaḥ, kathaṃ vā kriyatām” iti //
GS38kautil_u:4960: KAZ05.6.35/ tathā bruvāṇaṃ yoga.puruṣā brūyuḥ “ko^anyo bhavat.purogād
GS38kautil_u:4961: asmād rājñaś cāturvarṇyam arhati pālayitum” iti //
GS38kautil_u:4962: KAZ05.6.36/ “tathā” ity amātyaḥ kumāraṃ rāja.kanyāṃ garbhiṇīṃ devīṃ vā^adhikurvīta, bandhu.saṃbandhināṃ mitra.amitra.dūtānāṃ ca darśayet //
GS38kautil_u:4963: KAZ05.6.37/ bhakta.vetana.viśeṣam amātyānām āyudhīyānāṃ ca kārayet,
GS38kautil_u:4965: KAZ05.6.38/ evaṃ durga.rāṣṭra.mukhyān ābhāṣeta, yathā.arhaṃ ca
GS38kautil_u:4968: KAZ05.6.40/ kanyāyāṃ samāna.jātīyād apatyam utpādya vā^abhiṣiñcet //
GS38kautil_u:4969: KAZ05.6.41/ mātuś citta.kṣobha.bhayāt kulyam alpa.sattvaṃ chātraṃ ca lakṣaṇyam upanidadhyāt
GS38kautil_u:4971: KAZ05.6.43/ na ca^ātma.arthaṃ kaṃcid utkṛṣṭam upabhogaṃ kārayet //
GS38kautil_u:4974: KAZ05.6.45ab/ yauvanasthaṃ ca yāceta viśramaṃ citta.kāraṇāt /
GS38kautil_u:4977: KAZ05.6.46cd/ araṇyaṃ dīrgha.sattraṃ vā seveta^ārucyatāṃ gataḥ //
GS38kautil_u:4978: KAZ05.6.47ab/ mukhyair avagṛhītaṃ vā rājānaṃ tat.priya.āśritaḥ /
GS38kautil_u:4980: KAZ05.6.48ab/ siddha.vyañjana.rūpo vā yogam āsthāya pārthivam /
GS38kautil_u:4981: KAZ05.6.48cd/ labheta labdhvā dūṣyeṣu dāṇḍakarmikam ācaret //E
GS38kautil_u:4992: KAZ06.1.05/ śauryam amarṣaḥ śīghratā dākṣyaṃ ca^utsāha.guṇāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:4993: KAZ06.1.06/ vāgmī pragalbhaḥ smṛti.mati.balavān udagraḥ sv.avagrahaḥ
GS38kautil_u:5002: KAZ06.1.08/ madhye ca^ante ca sthānavān ātma.dhāraṇaḥ para.dhāraṇaś
GS38kautil_u:5011: KAZ06.1.10/ dharma.adhigataḥ pūrvaiḥ svayaṃ vā hema.rūpya.prāyaś
GS38kautil_u:5012: citra.sthūla.ratna.hiraṇyo dīrghām apy āpadam anāyatiṃ saheta^iti
GS38kautil_u:5014: KAZ06.1.11/ pitṛ.paitāmaho nityo vaśyas tuṣṭa.bhṛta.putra.dāraḥ pravāseṣv avisaṃvāditaḥ sarvatra^apratihato duḥkha.saho bahu.yuddhaḥ
GS38kautil_u:5017: KAZ06.1.12/ pitṛ.paitāmahaṃ nityaṃ vaśyam advaidhyaṃ mahal.laghu.samuttham
GS38kautil_u:5023: KAZ06.1.14/ evaṃ.bhūto hi śatruḥ sukhaḥ samucchettuṃ bhavati //
GS38kautil_u:5025: KAZ06.1.15cd/ uktāḥ pratyaṅga.bhūtās tāḥ prakṛtā rāja.sampadaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5026: KAZ06.1.16ab/ sampādayaty asampannāḥ prakṛtīr ātmavān nṛpaḥ /
GS38kautil_u:5027: KAZ06.1.16cd/ vivṛddhāś ca^anuraktāś ca prakṛtīr hanty anātmavān //
GS38kautil_u:5028: KAZ06.1.17ab/ tataḥ sa duṣṭa.prakṛtiś cāturanto^apy anātmavān /
GS38kautil_u:5029: KAZ06.1.17cd/ hanyate vā prakṛtibhir yāti vā dviṣatāṃ vaśam //
GS38kautil_u:5030: KAZ06.1.18ab/ ātmavāṃs tv alpa.deśo^api yuktaḥ prakṛti.sampadā /
GS38kautil_u:5031: KAZ06.1.18cd/nayajñaḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jayaty eva na hīyate //E
GS38kautil_u:5037: KAZ06.2.05/ kṣayaḥ sthānaṃ vṛddhir ity udayās tasya //
GS38kautil_u:5039: KAZ06.2.07/ daiva.mānuṣaṃ hi karma lokaṃ yāpayati //
GS38kautil_u:5041: KAZ06.2.09/ tasminn iṣṭena phalena yogo^ayaḥ, aniṣṭena^anayaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5043: KAZ06.2.11/ tasmin yoga.kṣema.niṣpattir nayaḥ, vipattir apanayaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5047: KAZ06.2.14/ tasya samantato maṇḍalī.bhūtā bhūmy.anantarā ari.prakṛtiḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5049: KAZ06.2.16/ ari.sampad.yuktaḥ sāmantaḥ śatruḥ, vyasanī yātavyaḥ,
GS38kautil_u:5050: anapāśrayo durbala.āśrayo vā^ucchedanīyaḥ, viparyaye pīḍanīyaḥ karśanīyo
GS38kautil_u:5053: KAZ06.2.18/ tasmān mitram ari.mitraṃ mitra.mitram ari.mitra.mitraṃ
GS38kautil_u:5054: ca^ānantaryeṇa bhūmīnāṃ prasajyante purastāt, paścāt pārṣṇi.grāha ākrandaḥ
GS38kautil_u:5066: KAZ06.2.24/ vijigīṣur mitraṃ mitra.mitraṃ vā^asya prakṛtayas tisraḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5071: KAZ06.2.28/ dvādaśa rāja.prakṛtayaḥ ṣaṣṭir dravya.prakṛtayaḥ, saṃkṣepeṇa
GS38kautil_u:5077: KAZ06.2.33/ śaktis trividhā - jñāna.balaṃ mantra.śaktiḥ, kośa.daṇḍa.balaṃ
GS38kautil_u:5082: KAZ06.2.35/ tābhir abhyuccito jyāyān bhavati, apacito hīnaḥ, tulya.śaktiḥ
GS38kautil_u:5084: KAZ06.2.36/ tasmāt^śaktiṃ siddhiṃ ca ghaṭeta^ātmany āveśayitum, sādhāraṇo vā dravya.prakṛtiṣv ānantaryeṇa śauca.vaśena vā //
GS38kautil_u:5086: KAZ06.2.38/ yadi vā paśyet “amitro me śakti.yukto
GS38kautil_u:5089: upakṣīṇaḥ pramatto vā sādhyo me bhaviṣyati, vigraha.abhiyukto vā
GS38kautil_u:5092: “balavān vā rājā parataḥ śatrum ucchettu.kāmaḥ tam ucchidya mām
GS38kautil_u:5093: ucchindyād” iti balavatā prārthitasya me vipanna.karma.ārambhasya vā sāhāyyaṃ dāsyati”, madhyama.lipsāyāṃ ca, ity evaṃ.ādiṣu kāraṇeṣv
GS38kautil_u:5095: KAZ06.2.39ab/ nemim eka.antarān rājñaḥ kṛtvā ca^anantarān arān /
GS38kautil_u:5096: KAZ06.2.39cd/ nābhim ātmānam āyacchen netā prakṛti.maṇḍale //
GS38kautil_u:5097: KAZ06.2.40ab/ madhye hy upahitaḥ śatrur netur mitrasya ca^ubhayoḥ /
GS38kautil_u:5098: KAZ06.2.40cd/ ucchedyaḥ pīḍanīyo vā balavān api jāyate //E
GS38kautil_u:5105: KAZ07.1.05/ ṣāḍguṇyam eva^etad avasthā.bhedād iti kauṭilyaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5115: KAZ07.1.15/ “na māṃ paro na^ahaṃ param upahantuṃ śaktaḥ” ity āsīta //
GS38kautil_u:5120: KAZ07.1.20/ teṣāṃ yasmin vā guṇe sthitaḥ paśyet “iha.sthaḥ śakṣyāmi
GS38kautil_u:5122: ātmanaḥ pravartayitum, parasya ca^etāni karmāṇy upahantum” iti tam ātiṣṭhet //
GS38kautil_u:5124: KAZ07.1.22/ “āśutarā me vṛddhir bhūyastarā vṛddhy.udayatarā vā bhaviṣyati,
GS38kautil_u:5125: viparītā parasya” iti jñātvā para.vṛddhim upekṣeta //
GS38kautil_u:5126: KAZ07.1.23/ tulya.kāla.phala.udayāyāṃ vā vṛddhau saṃdhim upeyāt //
GS38kautil_u:5127: KAZ07.1.24/ yasmin vā guṇe sthitaḥ sva.karmaṇām upaghātaṃ paśyen na^itarasya tasmin na tiṣṭhet //
GS38kautil_u:5131: KAZ07.1.27/ tulya.kāla.phala.udaye vā kṣaye saṃdhim upeyāt //
GS38kautil_u:5132: KAZ07.1.28/ yasmin vā guṇe sthitaḥ sva.karma.vṛddhiṃ kṣayaṃ vā na^abhipaśyed etat.sthānam
GS38kautil_u:5133: KAZ07.1.29/ “hrasvataraṃ vṛddhy.udayataraṃ vā sthāsyāmi, viparītaṃ paraḥ”
GS38kautil_u:5135: KAZ07.1.30/ “tulya.kāla.phala.udaye vā sthāne saṃdhim upeyād” ity ācāryāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5137: KAZ07.1.32a/ yadi vā paśyet “sandhau sthito mahā.phalaiḥ sva.karmabhiḥ
GS38kautil_u:5138: para.karmāṇy upahaniṣyāmi, mahā.phalāni vā sva.karmāṇy upabhokṣye,
GS38kautil_u:5142: KAZ07.1.32b/ balinā^atimātreṇa vā saṃhitaḥ paraḥ sva.karma.upaghātaṃ
GS38kautil_u:5143: prāpsyati, yena vā vigṛhīto mayā.saṃdhatte tena^asya vigrahaṃ dīrghaṃ kariṣyāmi, mayā vā saṃhitasya mad.dveṣiṇo jana.padaṃ pīḍayiṣyati - //
GS38kautil_u:5144: KAZ07.1.32c/ para.upahato vā^asya jana.pado mām āgamiṣyati, tataḥ karmasu vṛddhiṃ prāpsyāmi, vipanna.karma.ārambho vā viṣamasthaḥ paraḥ karmasu na me vikrameta - //
GS38kautil_u:5145: KAZ07.1.32d/ parataḥ pravṛtta.karma.ārambho vā tābhyāṃ saṃhitaḥ karmasu vṛddhiṃ prāpsyāmi, śatru.pratibaddhaṃ vā śatruṇā saṃdhiṃ kṛtvā maṇḍalaṃ bhetsyāmi - //
GS38kautil_u:5146: KAZ07.1.32e/ bhinnam avāpsyāmi, daṇḍa.anugraheṇa vā śatrum upagṛhya
GS38kautil_u:5147: maṇḍala.lipsāyāṃ vidveṣaṃ grāhayiṣyāmi, vidviṣṭaṃ tena^eva ghātayiṣyāmi”
GS38kautil_u:5149: KAZ07.1.33a/ yadi vā paśyet “āyudhīya.prāyaḥ śreṇī.prāyo vā me jana.padaḥ
GS38kautil_u:5151: pratihantum, viṣaya.ante durgam aviṣahyam apāśrito vā śakṣyāmi para.karmāṇy upahantuṃ -
GS38kautil_u:5152: KAZ07.1.33b/ vyasana.pīḍa.upahata.utsāho vā paraḥ samprāpta.karma.upaghāta.kālaḥ, vigṛhītasya^anyato vā śakṣyāmi jana.padam
GS38kautil_u:5153: apavāhayitum” iti vigrahe sthito vṛddhim ātiṣṭhet //
GS38kautil_u:5154: KAZ07.1.34/ yadi vā manyeta “na me śaktaḥ paraḥ karmāṇy upahantuṃ na^ahaṃ
GS38kautil_u:5155: tasya karma.upaghātī vā, vyasanam asya, śva.varāhayor iva kalahe vā,
GS38kautil_u:5156: sva.karma.anuṣṭhāna.paro vā vardhiṣye” ity āsanena vṛddhim ātiṣṭhet //
GS38kautil_u:5157: KAZ07.1.35/ yadi vā manyeta “yāna.sādhyaḥ karma.upaghātaḥ śatroḥ,
GS38kautil_u:5158: prativihita.sva.karma.ārakṣaś ca^asmi” iti yānena vṛddhim ātiṣṭhet //

GS38kautil_u:5636: KAZ07.9.45ab/ vijigīṣor amitraṃ yan mitram antardhitāṃ gatam /
GS38kautil_u:5638: KAZ07.9.46ab/ priyaṃ parasya vā rakṣyaṃ pūjyaṃ sambaddham eva vā /
GS38kautil_u:5639: KAZ07.9.46cd/ anugṛhṇāti yan mitraṃ śatru.sādhāraṇaṃ hi tat //
GS38kautil_u:5640: KAZ07.9.47ab/ prakṛṣṭa.bhaumaṃ saṃtuṣṭaṃ balavac ca^ālasaṃ ca yat /
GS38kautil_u:5641: KAZ07.9.47cd/ udāsīnaṃ bhavaty etad vyasanād avamānitam //
GS38kautil_u:5642: KAZ07.9.48ab/ arer netuś ca yad vṛddhiṃ daurbalyād anuvartate /
GS38kautil_u:5643: KAZ07.9.48cd/ ubhayasya^apy avidviṣṭaṃ vidyād ubhaya.bhāvi tat //
GS38kautil_u:5645: KAZ07.9.49cd/ yo mitraṃ samupekṣeta sa mṛtyum upagūhati //
GS38kautil_u:5646: KAZ07.9.50/ kṣipram alpo lābhaś cirān mahān iti vā “kṣipram alpo lābhaḥ kārya.deśa.kāla.saṃvādakaḥ śreyān” ity ācāryāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5648: KAZ07.9.52/ cirād avinipātī bīja.sadharmā mahāml lābhaḥ śreyān, viparyaye pūrvaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5649: KAZ07.9.53ab/ evaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhruve lābhe lābha.aṃśe ca guṇa.udayam /
GS38kautil_u:5652: KAZ07.10.01/ “tvaṃ ca^ahaṃ ca bhūmiṃ labhāvahe” iti bhūmi.saṃdhiḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5653: KAZ07.10.02/ tayor yaḥ pratyupasthita.arthaḥ sampannāṃ bhūmim avāpnoti
GS38kautil_u:5655: KAZ07.10.03/ tulye sampanna.alābhe yo balavantam ākramya bhūmim avāpnoti so^atisaṃdhatte
GS38kautil_u:5656: KAZ07.10.04/ bhūmi.lābhaṃ śatru.karśanaṃ pratāpaṃ ca hi prāpnoti //
GS38kautil_u:5658: KAZ07.10.06/ durbala eva ca bhūmi.lābhaḥ, tat.sāmantaś ca mitram amitra.bhāvaṃ gacchati
GS38kautil_u:5659: KAZ07.10.07/ tulye balīyastve yaḥ sthita.śatrum utpāṭya bhūmim avāpnoti
GS38kautil_u:5665: KAZ07.10.11/ viparītā balavat sāmantā kośa.daṇḍa.avacchedanī ca bhūmir bhavati //
GS38kautil_u:5666: KAZ07.10.12/ sampannā nitya.amitrā manda.guṇā vā bhūmir anitya.amitrā^iti
GS38kautil_u:5667: “sampannā nitya.amitrā śreyasī bhūmiḥ sampannā hi kośa.daṇḍau sampādayati,
GS38kautil_u:5671: KAZ07.10.15/ nityaś ca śatrur upakṛte ca^apakṛte ca śatrur eva bhavati,
GS38kautil_u:5672: anityas tu śatrur upakārād anapakārād vā śāmyati //
GS38kautil_u:5673: KAZ07.10.16/ yasyā hi bhūmer bahu.durgāś cora.gaṇair mleccha.aṭavībhir vā
GS38kautil_u:5674: nitya.avirahitāḥ pratyantāḥ sā nitya.amitrā, viparyaye tv anitya.amitrā //
GS38kautil_u:5675: KAZ07.10.17/ alpā pratyāsannā mahatī vyavahitā vā bhūmir iti alpā pratyāsannā śreyasī //
GS38kautil_u:5676: KAZ07.10.18/ sukhā hi prāptuṃ pālayitum abhisārayituṃ ca bhavati //
GS38kautil_u:5678: KAZ07.10.20/ vyavahitayor api daṇḍa.dhāraṇā^ātma.dhāraṇā vā bhūmir iti
GS38kautil_u:5680: KAZ07.10.21/ sā hi sva.samutthābhyāṃ kośa.daṇḍābhyāṃ dhāryate //
GS38kautil_u:5682: KAZ07.10.23/ bāliśāt prājñād vā bhūmi.lābha iti bāliśād.bhūmi.lābhaḥ
GS38kautil_u:5684: KAZ07.10.24/ suprāpyā^anupālyā hi bhavati, apratyādeyā ca //
GS38kautil_u:5687: KAZ07.10.27/ ucchedanīyo hy anapāśrayo durbala.apāśrayo vā^abhiyuktaḥ
GS38kautil_u:5688: kośa.daṇḍāv ādāya^apasartu.kāmaḥ prakṛtibhis tyajyate, na pīḍanīyo durga.mitra.pratiṣṭabdhaḥ
GS38kautil_u:5691: KAZ07.10.29/ sthāleyaṃ hi surodha.avamarda.avaskandam anihśrāvi.śatru ca
GS38kautil_u:5692: KAZ07.10.30/ nadī.durgaṃ tu dvi.guṇa.kleśa.karam, udakaṃ ca pātavyaṃ
GS38kautil_u:5697: KAZ07.10.33/ pārvataṃ tu sv.ārakṣaṃ duruparodhi kṛcchra.ārohaṇam, bhagne
GS38kautil_u:5698: ca^ekasmin na sarva.vadhaḥ, śilā.vṛkṣa.pramokṣaś ca mahā.apakāriṇām //
GS38kautil_u:5700: KAZ07.10.35/ nimna.yodhino hy uparuddha.deśa.kālāḥ, sthala.yodhinas tu
GS38kautil_u:5703: KAZ07.10.37/ khanakā hi khātena śastreṇa ca^ubhayathā yudhyante,
GS38kautil_u:5706: KAZ07.10.38cd/ saṃhitebhyaḥ parebhyaś ca viśeṣam adhigacchati //E
GS38kautil_u:5708: KAZ07.11.01/ “tvaṃ ca^ahaṃ ca śūnyaṃ niveśayāvahe” ity anavasita.saṃdhiḥ
GS38kautil_u:5709: KAZ07.11.02/ tayor yaḥ pratyupasthita.artho yathā.ukta.guṇāṃ bhūmiṃ niveśayati so^atisaṃdhatte
GS38kautil_u:5710: KAZ07.11.03/ tatra^api sthalam audakaṃ vā^iti mahataḥ sthalād alpam
GS38kautil_u:5711: audakaṃ śreyaḥ, sātatyād avasthitatvāc ca phalānām //
GS38kautil_u:5715: KAZ07.11.06/ tayor alpa.bahutve dhānya.kāntād alpān mahad adhānya.kāntaṃ
GS38kautil_u:5717: KAZ07.11.07/ mahaty avakāśe hi sthālyāś ca^anūpyāś ca^oṣadhayo bhavanti //
GS38kautil_u:5718: KAZ07.11.08/ durga.ādīni ca karmāṇi prabhūtyena kriyante //
GS38kautil_u:5722: KAZ07.11.11/ dhānya.mūlā hi durga.ādīnāṃ karmaṇām ārambhāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5725: yoniḥ prabhūta.nidhāna.kṣamaś ca, viparīto hasti.vana.bhogaḥ” ity ācāryāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5727: KAZ07.11.15/ śakyaṃ dravya.vanam anekam anekasyāṃ bhūmau vāpayitum, na
GS38kautil_u:5732: KAZ07.11.18/ bhinna.manuṣyā śreṇī.manuṣyā vā bhūmir iti bhinna.manuṣyā
GS38kautil_u:5734: KAZ07.11.19/ bhinna.manuṣyā bhogyā bhavati, anupajāpyā ca^anyeṣām,
GS38kautil_u:5738: avara.varṇa.prāyā śreyasī, bāhulyād dhruvatvāc ca kṛṣyāḥ karṣakavatī,
GS38kautil_u:5742: KAZ07.11.23/ durga.apāśrayā puruṣa.apāśrayā vā bhūmir iti puruṣa.apāśrayā
GS38kautil_u:5745: KAZ07.11.25/ apuruṣā gaur vandhy eva kiṃ duhīta //
GS38kautil_u:5746: KAZ07.11.26/ mahā.kṣaya.vyaya.niveśāṃ tu bhūmim avāptu.kāmaḥ pūrvam eva kretāraṃ paṇeta durbalam arāja.bījinaṃ nirutsāham apakṣam anyāya.vṛttiṃ
GS38kautil_u:5748: KAZ07.11.27/ mahā.kṣaya.vyaya.niveśāyāṃ hi bhūmau durbalo rāja.bījī
GS38kautil_u:5750: KAZ07.11.28/ balavān arāja.bījī kṣaya.vyaya.bhayād asagandhābhiḥ prakṛtibhis tyajyate //
GS38kautil_u:5751: KAZ07.11.29/ nirutsāhas tu daṇḍavān api daṇḍasya^apraṇetā sadaṇḍaḥ
GS38kautil_u:5753: KAZ07.11.30/ kośavān apy apakṣaḥ kṣaya.vyaya.anugraha.hīnatvān na kutaścit prāpnoti //
GS38kautil_u:5761: KAZ07.11.37/ “yat.kiṃcid.ārabhamāṇo hi vijigīṣoḥ kadācic chidram āsādayed”
GS38kautil_u:5763: KAZ07.11.38/ yathā chidraṃ tathā vināśam apy āsādayed iti kauṭilyaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5764: KAZ07.11.39/ teṣām alābhe yathā pārṣṇi.grāha.upagrahe vakṣyāmas tathā bhūmim avasthāpayet
GS38kautil_u:5766: KAZ07.11.41/ guṇavatīm ādeyāṃ vā bhūmiṃ balavatā krayeṇa yācitaḥ saṃdhim avasthāpya dadyāt
GS38kautil_u:5768: KAZ07.11.43/ samena vā yācitaḥ kāraṇam avekṣya dadyāt “pratyādeyā me bhūmir vaśyā vā, anayā pratibaddhaḥ paro me vaśyo bhaviṣyati^
GS38kautil_u:5769: bhūmi.vikrayād vā mitra.hiraṇya.lābhaḥ kārya.sāmarthya.karo me bhaviṣyati” iti //
GS38kautil_u:5772: KAZ07.11.45ab/ evaṃ mitraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca sajanām ajanāṃ ca gām /
GS38kautil_u:5775: KAZ07.12.01/ “tvaṃ ca^ahaṃ ca durgaṃ kārayāvahe” iti karma.saṃdhiḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5776: KAZ07.12.02/ tayor yo daiva.kṛtam aviṣahyam alpa.vyaya.ārambhaṃ durgaṃ kārayati so^atisaṃdhatte
GS38kautil_u:5778: KAZ07.12.04/ setu.bandhayor apy āhārya.udakāt saha.udakaḥ śreyān //
GS38kautil_u:5782: KAZ07.12.07/ nadī.mātṛkaṃ hi sv.ājīvam apāśrayaś ca^āpadi bhavati //
GS38kautil_u:5786: KAZ07.12.09/ tatra^api “bahu.kuṇṭha.alpa.śūrayoḥ alpa.śūraṃ śreyaḥ, śūreṣu hi yuddham, alpāḥ śūrā bahūn aśūrān bhañjanti, te bhagnāḥ sva.sainya.avaghātino bhavanti” ity ācāryāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5788: KAZ07.12.11/ kuṇṭhā bahavaḥ śreyāṃsaḥ, skandha.viniyogād anekaṃ karma kurvāṇāḥ sveṣām apāśrayo yuddhe, pareṣāṃ durdharṣā vibhīṣaṇāś ca //
GS38kautil_u:5789: KAZ07.12.12/ bahuṣu hi kuṇṭheṣu vinaya.karmaṇā śakyaṃ śauryam ādhātum, na tv eva^alpeṣu śūreṣu bahutvam iti //
GS38kautil_u:5790: KAZ07.12.13/ khanyor api yaḥ prabhūta.sārām adurga.mārgām
GS38kautil_u:5792: KAZ07.12.14/ tatra^api mahā.sāram alpam alpa.sāraṃ vā prabhūtam iti
GS38kautil_u:5793: “mahā.sāram alpaṃ śreyaḥ, vajra.maṇi.muktā.pravāla.hema.rūpya.dhātur hi prabhūtam alpa.sāram atyargheṇa grasate” ity ācāryāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5795: KAZ07.12.16/ cirād alpo mahā.sārasya kretā vidyate, prabhūtaḥ sātatyād alpa.sārasya //
GS38kautil_u:5812: alpa.vyaya.vyāyāmo vā vaṇik.pathaḥ śreyān, prabhūta.viṣayo vā
GS38kautil_u:5814: KAZ07.12.26/ tena pūrvaḥ paścimaś ca vaṇik.patho vyākhyātaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5818: KAZ07.12.29/ para.karma.udayo netuḥ kṣayo vṛddhir viparyaye //
GS38kautil_u:5819: KAZ07.12.30/ tulye karma.pathe sthānaṃ jñeyaṃ svaṃ vijigīṣuṇā //
GS38kautil_u:5821: KAZ07.12.32/ samāya.vyayatā sthānaṃ karmasu jñeyam ātmanaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5823: KAZ07.12.34/ karma labdhvā viśiṣṭaḥ syād ity uktāḥ karma.saṃdhayaḥ //E
GS38kautil_u:5825: KAZ07.13.01/ saṃhatya^ari.vijigīṣvor amitrayoḥ para.abhiyoginoḥ pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇator yaḥ śakti.sampannasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so^atisaṃdhatte //
GS38kautil_u:5826: KAZ07.13.02/ śakti.sampanno hy amitram ucchidya pārṣṇi.grāham ucchindyāt,
GS38kautil_u:5828: KAZ07.13.03/ śakti.sāmye yo vipula.ārambhasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so^atisaṃdhatte //
GS38kautil_u:5829: KAZ07.13.04/ vipula.ārambho hy amitram ucchidya pārṣṇi.grāham ucchindyāt,
GS38kautil_u:5831: KAZ07.13.05/ ārambha.sāmye yaḥ sarva.saṃdohena prayātasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti
GS38kautil_u:5833: KAZ07.13.06/ śūnya.mūlo hy asya sukaro bhavati, naika.deśa.bala.prayātaḥ
GS38kautil_u:5835: KAZ07.13.07/ bala.upādāna.sāmye yaś cala.amitraṃ prayātasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so^atisaṃdhatte
GS38kautil_u:5836: KAZ07.13.08/ cala.amitraṃ prayāto hi sukhena^avāpta.siddhiḥ pārṣṇi.grāham
GS38kautil_u:5838: KAZ07.13.09/ asau hi durga.pratihataḥ pārṣṇi.grāhe ca pratinivṛttaḥ sthitena^amitreṇa^avagṛhyate
GS38kautil_u:5840: KAZ07.13.11/ śatru.sāmye yo dhārmika.abhiyoginaḥ pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so^atisaṃdhatte //
GS38kautil_u:5841: KAZ07.13.12/ dhārmika.abhiyogī hi sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca dveṣyo bhavati,
GS38kautil_u:5845: KAZ07.13.14/ mitra.abhiyoginoḥ pārṣṇi.grahaṇe ta eva hetavaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5846: KAZ07.13.15/ mitram amitraṃ ca^abhiyuñjānayor yo mitra.abhiyoginaḥ pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so^atisaṃdhatte
GS38kautil_u:5849: KAZ07.13.17/ sukaro hi mitreṇa saṃdhir na^amitreṇa //
GS38kautil_u:5850: KAZ07.13.18/ mitram amitraṃ ca^uddharator yo^amitra.uddhāriṇaḥ pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so^atisaṃdhatte
GS38kautil_u:5851: KAZ07.13.19/ vṛddha.mitro hy amitra.uddhārī pārṣṇi.grāham ucchindyāt,
GS38kautil_u:5853: KAZ07.13.20/ tayor alabdha.lābha.apagamane yasya.amitro mahato lābhād viyuktaḥ kṣaya.vyaya.adhiko vā sa pārṣṇi.grāho^atisaṃdhatte //
GS38kautil_u:5854: KAZ07.13.21/ labdha.lābha.apagamane yasya^amitro lābhena śaktyā hīnaḥ sa
GS38kautil_u:5859: KAZ07.13.23/ pārśva.sthāyī hi yātavya.abhisāro mūla.ābādhakaś ca bhavati,
GS38kautil_u:5861: KAZ07.13.24ab/ pārṣṇi.grāhās trayo jñeyāḥ śatroś ceṣṭā.nirodhakāḥ /
GS38kautil_u:5862: KAZ07.13.24cd/ sāmantaḥ pṛṣṭhato vargaḥ prativeśau ca pārśvayoḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5863: KAZ07.13.25ab/ arer netuś ca madhyastho durbalo^antardhir ucyate /
GS38kautil_u:5865: KAZ07.13.26/ madhyamaṃ tvari.vijigīṣvor lipsamānayor madhyamasya pārṣṇiṃ
GS38kautil_u:5866: gṛhṇator labdha.lābha.apagamane yo madhyamaṃ mitrād viyojayaty amitraṃ ca
GS38kautil_u:5868: KAZ07.13.27/ saṃdheyaś ca śatrur upakurvāṇo, na mitraṃ mitra.bhāvād
GS38kautil_u:5872: Kaś07.13.30/ vyāyāma.yuddhe hi kṣaya.vyayābhyām ubhayor avṛddhiḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5873: KAZ07.13.31/ jitvā^api hi kṣiṇa.daṇḍa.kośaḥ parājito bhavati” ity ācāryāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5876: KAZ07.13.34/ tulye kṣaya.vyaye yaḥ purastād dūṣya.balaṃ ghātayitvā nihśalyaḥ paścād vaśya.balo yudhyeta so^atisaṃdhatte //
GS38kautil_u:5877: KAZ07.13.35/ dvayor api purastād dūṣya.bala.ghātinor yo bahulataraṃ śaktimattaram atyanta.dūṣyaṃ ca ghātayet so^atisaṃdhatte //
GS38kautil_u:5879: KAZ07.13.37ab/ pārṣṇi.grāho^abhiyoktā vā yātavyo vā yadā bhavet /
GS38kautil_u:5880: KAZ07.13.37cd/ vijigīṣus tadā tatra netram etat samācaret //
GS38kautil_u:5881: KAZ07.13.38ab/ pārṣṇi.grāho bhaven netā śatror mitra.abhiyoginaḥ /
GS38kautil_u:5885: KAZ07.13.40ab/ ari.mitreṇa mitraṃ ca purastād avaghaṭṭayet /
GS38kautil_u:5886: KAZ07.13.40cd/ mitra.mitram areś ca^api mitra.mitreṇa vārayet //
GS38kautil_u:5889: KAZ07.13.42ab/ evaṃ maṇḍalam ātma.arthaṃ vijigīṣur niveśayet /
GS38kautil_u:5890: KAZ07.13.42cd/ pṛṣṭhataś ca purastāc ca mitra.prakṛti.sampadā //
GS38kautil_u:5891: KAZ07.13.43ab/ kṛtsne ca maṇḍale nityaṃ dūtān gūḍhāṃś ca vāsayet /
GS38kautil_u:5892: KAZ07.13.43cd/ mitra.bhūtaḥ sapatnānāṃ hatvā hatvā ca saṃvṛtaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5893: KAZ07.13.44ab/ asaṃvṛtasya kāryāṇi prāptāny api viśeṣataḥ /
GS38kautil_u:5896: KAZ07.14.01/ sāmavāyikair evam abhiyukto vijigīṣur yas teṣāṃ pradhānas taṃ brūyāt “tvayā me saṃdhiḥ, idaṃ hiraṇyam, ahaṃ ca mitram, dvi.guṇā te
GS38kautil_u:5897: vṛddhiḥ, na^arhasy ātma.kṣayeṇa mitra.mukhān amitrān vardhayitum, ete hi vṛddhās tvām eva paribhaviṣyanti” iti //
GS38kautil_u:5898: KAZ07.14.02/ bhedaṃ vā brūyāt “anapakāro yathā^aham etaiḥ
GS38kautil_u:5899: sambhūya^abhiyuktas tathā tvām apy ete saṃhita.balāḥ svasthā vyasane vā^abhiyokṣyante, balaṃ hi cittaṃ vikaroti, tad eṣāṃ vighātaya” iti //
GS38kautil_u:5900: KAZ07.14.03/ bhinneṣu pradhānam upagṛhya hīneṣu vikramayet, hīnān anugrāhya vā pradhāne, yathā vā śreyo^abhimanyeta tathā //
GS38kautil_u:5901: KAZ07.14.04/ vairaṃ vā parair grāhayitvā visaṃvādayet //
GS38kautil_u:5902: KAZ07.14.05/ phala.bhūyastvena vā pradhānam upajāpya saṃdhiṃ kārayet //
GS38kautil_u:5903: KAZ07.14.06/ atha^ubhaya.vetanāḥ phala.bhūyastvaṃ darśayantaḥ sāmavāyikān “atisaṃhitāḥ stha” ity udddūṣayeyuḥ //
GS38kautil_u:5905: KAZ07.14.08/ atha^ubhaya.vetanā bhūyo bhedam eṣāṃ kuryuḥ “evaṃ tad yad asmābhir darśitam” iti //
GS38kautil_u:5908: anurakta.prakṛktiṃ lobhād bhayād vā saṃghātam upāgataṃ vijigīṣor bhītaṃ
GS38kautil_u:5909: rājya.pratisambaddhaṃ mitraṃ cala.amitraṃ vā pūrvān uttara.abhāve sādhayet
GS38kautil_u:5912: bhītam ebhyaḥ kośa.daṇḍa.anugraheṇa, svato bhītaṃ viśvāsya

GS38kautil_u:6194: KAZ07.18.31ab/ teṣāṃ śatru.virodhe yan mitram eka.arthatāṃ vrajet /

GS38kautil_u:6216: KAZ07.18.41ab/ amitra.vyasanān mitram utthitaṃ yad virajyati /

GS38kautil_u:6219: KAZ07.18.42cd/ sarva.upāyān samādadhyād etān yaś ca^artha.śāstravit /

GS38kautil_u:6556: KAZ08.5.09/ kalatra.garbhy.antaḥ.śalyayoḥ kalatra.garbhi unmucya kalatraṃ yudhyeta, na^antaḥ.śalyam antara.mitram //
GS38kautil_u:6558: sāma.ādibhir yudhyeta, na bhinna.garbham anyonyasmād bhinnam //
GS38kautil_u:6564: KAZ08.5.13/ uparuddha.parikṣiptayor uparuddham anyato niṣkramya^uparoddhāraṃ pratiyudhyeta, na parikṣiptaṃ sarvataḥ pratiruddham
GS38kautil_u:6565: KAZ08.5.14/ chinna.dhānya.puruṣa.vīvadhayoḥ chinna.dhānyam anyato dhānyam ānīya jaṅgama.sthāvara.āhāraṃ vā yudhyeta, na chinna.puruṣa.vīvadham
GS38kautil_u:6568: vikṣiptaṃ sainyam āpadi śakyam āvāhayitum, na mitra.vikṣiptaṃ
GS38kautil_u:6580: KAZ08.5.20ab/ rakṣet sva.daṇḍaṃ vyasane śatrubhyo nityam utthitaḥ /
GS38kautil_u:6581: KAZ08.5.20cd/ prahared daṇḍa.randhreṣu śatrūṇāṃ nityam utthitaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:6582: KAZ08.5.21ab/ yato nimittaṃ vyasanaṃ prakṛtīnām avāpnuyāt /
GS38kautil_u:6583: KAZ08.5.21cd/ prāg eva pratikurvīta tan nimittam atandritaḥ /
GS38kautil_u:6584: KAZ08.5.22ab/ abhiyātaṃ svayaṃ mitraṃ sambhūya^anya.vaśena vā //
GS38kautil_u:6585: KAZ08.5.22cd/ parityaktam aśaktyā vā lobhena praṇayena vā /
GS38kautil_u:6587: KAZ08.5.23cd/ dvaidhī.bhāvena vā^amitraṃ yāsyatā vā^anyam anyataḥ /
GS38kautil_u:6588: KAZ08.5.24ab/ pṛthag vā saha.yāne vā viśvāsena^atisaṃhitam //
GS38kautil_u:6589: KAZ08.5.24cd/ bhaya.avamāna.ālasyair vā vyasanān na pramokṣitam /
GS38kautil_u:6590: KAZ08.5.25ab/ avaruddhaṃ sva.bhūmibhyaḥ samīpād vā bhayād gatam //
GS38kautil_u:6591: KAZ08.5.25cd/ ācchedanād adānād vā dattvā vā^apy avamānitam /
GS38kautil_u:6592: KAZ08.5.26ab/ atyāhāritam arthaṃ vā svayaṃ para.mukhena vā //
GS38kautil_u:6593: KAZ08.5.26cd/ atibhāre niyuktaṃ vā bhaṅktvā param upasthitam /
GS38kautil_u:6594: KAZ08.5.27ab/ upekṣitam aśaktyā vā prārthayitvā virodhitam //
GS38kautil_u:6595: KAZ08.5.27cd/ kṛcchreṇa sādhyate mitraṃ siddhaṃ ca^āśu virajyati /
GS38kautil_u:6596: KAZ08.5.28ab/ kṛta.prayāsaṃ mānyaṃ vā mohān mitram amānitam /
GS38kautil_u:6597: KAZ08.5.28cd/ mānitaṃ vā na sadṛśaṃ śaktito vā nivāritam //
GS38kautil_u:6599: KAZ08.5.29cd/ dūṣyair vā bhedituṃ mitraṃ sādhyaṃ siddhaṃ ca tiṣṭhati //

GS38kautil_u:6601: KAZ08.5.30cd/ utpannān vā praśamayed guṇair doṣa.upaghātibhiḥ //E

GS38kautil_u:6616: KAZ09.1.09/ utsāhavataś ca prabhāvavanto jitvā krītvā ca striyo bālāḥ paṅgavo^andhāś ca pṛthivīṃ jigyur iti //
GS38kautil_u:6618: KAZ09.1.11/ mantra.śakti.sampanno hi vandhya.buddhir aprabhāvo bhavati //

GS38kautil_u:6630: KAZ09.1.19/ tatra^araṇyo grāmyaḥ parvata audako bhaumaḥ samo viṣama iti viśeṣāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:6632: KAZ09.1.21/ yatra.ātmanaḥ sainya.vyāyāmānāṃ bhūmiḥ, abhūmiḥ parasya, sa uttamo deśaḥ, viparīto^adhamaḥ, sādhāraṇo madhyamaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:6634: KAZ09.1.23/ tasya rātrir ahaḥ pakṣo māsa ṛtur ayanaṃ saṃvatsaro yugam iti viśeṣāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:6636: KAZ09.1.25/ yatra.ātmanaḥ sainya.vyāyāmānām ṛtuḥ anṛtuḥ parasya, sa uttamaḥ kālaḥ, viparīto^adhamaḥ, sādhāraṇo madhyamaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:6637: KAZ09.1.26/ “śakti.deśa.kālānāṃ tu śaktiḥ śreyasī” ity ācāryāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:6638: KAZ09.1.27/ śaktimān hi nimna.sthalavato deśasya śīta.uṣṇa.varṣavataś ca kālasya śaktaḥ pratīkāre bhavati //
GS38kautil_u:6640: KAZ09.1.29/ “sthala.gato hi śvā nakraṃ vikarṣati, nimna.gato nakraḥ
GS38kautil_u:6643: KAZ09.1.31/ “divā kākaḥ kauśikaṃ hanti, rātrau kauśikaḥ kākam” iti //
GS38kautil_u:6646: KAZ09.1.34/ tair abhyuccitas tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ vā daṇḍasya^aṃśaṃ mūle pārṣṇyāṃ pratyanta.aṭavīṣu ca rakṣā vidhāya kārya.sādhana.sahaṃ
GS38kautil_u:6648: asaṃskṛta.durgama.mitraṃ vārṣikaṃ ca^asya sasyaṃ haimanaṃ ca muṣṭim upahantuṃ mārgaśīrṣīṃ yātrāṃ yāyāt //
GS38kautil_u:6649: KAZ09.1.35/ haimānaṃ ca^asya sasyaṃ vāsantikaṃ ca muṣṭim upahantuṃ caitrīṃ
GS38kautil_u:6652: ca^asya sasyaṃ vārṣikīṃ ca muṣṭim upahantuṃ jyeṣṭhāmūlīyāṃ yātrāṃ yāyāt //
GS38kautil_u:6653: KAZ09.1.37/ atyuṣṇam alpa.yavasa.indhana.udakaṃ vā deśaṃ hemante yāyāt //
GS38kautil_u:6654: KAZ09.1.38/ tuṣāra.durdinam agādha.nimna.prāyaṃ gahana.tṛṇa.vṛkṣaṃ vā deśaṃ grīṣme yāyāt //
GS38kautil_u:6656: KAZ09.1.40/ mārgaśīrṣīṃ taiṣīṃ ca^antareṇa dīrgha.kālāṃ yātrāṃ yāyāt,
GS38kautil_u:6657: caitrīṃ vaiśākhīṃ ca^antareṇa madhyama.kālām, jyeṣṭhāmūlīyām āṣāḍhīṃ ca^antareṇa hrasva.kālām, upoṣiṣyan vyasane caturthīm //
GS38kautil_u:6659: KAZ09.1.42/ prāyaśaś ca^ācāryāḥ “para.vyasane yātavyam” ity upadiśanti //
GS38kautil_u:6660: KAZ09.1.43/ śakty.udaye yātavyam anaikānntikatvād vyasanānām iti kauṭilyaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:6661: KAZ09.1.44/ yadā vā prayātaḥ karśayitum ucchetuṃ vā śaknuyād amitraṃ tadā
GS38kautil_u:6664: KAZ09.1.46/ hastino hy antaḥ.svedāḥ kuṣṭhino bhavanti //
GS38kautil_u:6667: KAZ09.1.48/ tasmāt prabhūta.udake deśe varṣati ca hasti.bala.prāyo yāyāt
GS38kautil_u:6672: KAZ09.1.52ab/ sarvā vā hrasva.kālāḥ syur yātavyāḥ kārya.lāghavāt /
GS38kautil_u:6673: KAZ09.1.52cd/ dīrghāḥ kārya.gurutvād vā varṣā.vāsaḥ paratra ca //E
GS38kautil_u:6676: KAZ09.2.02/ mūla.rakṣaṇād atiriktaṃ maula.balam, atyāvāpa.yuktā vā maulā mūle vikurvīran, bahula.anurakta.maula.balaḥ sāra.balo vā pratiyoddhā,
GS38kautil_u:6677: vyāyāmena yoddhavyam, prakṛṣṭe^adhvani kāle vā kṣaya.vyaya.sahatvān
GS38kautil_u:6679: anya.sainyānāṃ bhṛta.ādīnām aviśvāse, bala.kṣaye vā sarva.sainyānāṃ - iti
GS38kautil_u:6681: KAZ09.2.03/ “prabhūtaṃ me bhṛta.balam alpaṃ ca maula.balamṇ”
GS38kautil_u:6682_0: “parasya^alpaṃ viraktaṃ vā maula.balam, phalgu.prāyam asāraṃ vā bhṛta.sainyamṇ” “mantreṇa yoddhavyam alpa.vyāyāmenaṇ” “hrasvo
GS38kautil_u:6682_1: deśaḥ kālo vā tanu.kṣaya.vyayahṇ” “alpa.āvāpaṃ śānta.upajāpaṃ viśvastaṃ vā me
GS38kautil_u:6684: KAZ09.2.04/ “prabhūtaṃ me śreṇī.balam, śakyaṃ mūle yātrāyāṃ ca^ādhātumṇ”

GS38kautil_u:6688: “alpaḥ pravāso mantra.yuddhāc ca bhūyo vyāyāma.yuddhamṇ” “mitra.balena vā pūrvam aṭavīṃ nagara.sthānam āsāraṃ vā yodhayitvā paścāt sva.balena
GS38kautil_u:6689: yoddhayiṣyāmiṇ” “mitra.sādhāraṇaṃ vā me kāryamṇ” “mitra.āyattā vā me kārya.siddhihṇ” “āsannam anugrāhyaṃ vā me mitramṇ” “atyāvāpaṃ vā^asya
GS38kautil_u:6693: nagara.sthānam aṭavīṃ vā, tatra me śva.varāhayoḥ kalahe
GS38kautil_u:6694_0: caṇḍālasya^iva^anyatara.siddhir bhaviṣyatiṇ” “āsārāṇām aṭavīnāṃ vā kaṇṭaka.mardanam etat kariṣyāmiṇ” - atyupacitaṃ vā kopa.bhayān
GS38kautil_u:6694_1: nityam āsannam ari.balaṃ vāsayed, anyatra.abhyantara.kopa.śaṅkāyāḥ śatru.yuddha.avara.yuddha.kālaś ca
GS38kautil_u:6698: aṭavī.bala.prāyaḥ śatrur vā, “bilvaṃ bilvena hanyatāmṇ” alpaḥ prasāro hantavyaḥ - ity aṭavī.bala.kālaḥ

GS38kautil_u:6700: bhedyaṃ pareṣām, abhedyaṃ tulya.deśa.jāti.śilpa.prāyaṃ saṃhataṃ mahat //
GS38kautil_u:6702: KAZ09.2.10/ teṣāṃ kupya.bhṛtam amitra.aṭavī.balaṃ vilopa.bhṛtaṃ vā kuryāt //

GS38kautil_u:6704: anyatra vā preṣayet, aphalaṃ vā kuryāt, vikṣiptaṃ vā vāsayet, kāle
GS38kautil_u:6706: KAZ09.2.12/ parasya ca^etad bala.samuddānaṃ vighātayet, ātmanaḥ sampādayet //
GS38kautil_u:6707: KAZ09.2.13/ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ ca^eṣāṃ śreyaḥ samnāhayitum //

GS38kautil_u:6718: KAZ09.2.20/ avilope vyasane ca tābhyām ahi.bhayaṃ syāt //
GS38kautil_u:6720: pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ śreyaḥ samnāhayitum” ity ācāryāḥ //

GS38kautil_u:6725: KAZ09.2.25/ tasmād evaṃ.balaḥ paraḥ, tasya^etat pratibalam iti bala.samuddānaṃ kuryāt //

GS38kautil_u:6736: KAZ09.3.01/ alpaḥ paścāt.kopo mahān purastāl.lābha iti alpaḥ paścāt.kopo
GS38kautil_u:6738: KAZ09.3.02/ alpaṃ paścāt.kopaṃ prayātassya dūṣya.amitra.āṭavikā hi sarvataḥ samedhayanti, prakṛti.kopo vā //
GS38kautil_u:6739: KAZ09.3.03/ labdham api ca mahāntaṃ purastāl.lāham evaṃ.bhūte
GS38kautil_u:6741: KAZ09.3.04/ tasmāt sahasra.ekīyaḥ purastāl.lābhasya^ayogaḥ śata.ekīyo vā
GS38kautil_u:6743: KAZ09.3.05/ sūcī.mukhā hy anarthā iti loka.pravādaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:6745: KAZ09.3.07/ purastāl.lābhe senā.patiṃ kumāraṃ vā daṇḍa.cāriṇaṃ kurvīta //
GS38kautil_u:6746: KAZ09.3.08/ balavān vā rājā paścāt.kopa.avagraha.samarthaḥ purastāl.lābham
GS38kautil_u:6751: aneka.mukhyaṃ ca sthāpayitvā yāyāt, na vā yāyāt //
GS38kautil_u:6752: KAZ09.3.11/ abhyantara.kopo bāhya.kopāt pāpīyān ity uktaṃ purastāt //
GS38kautil_u:6755: KAZ09.3.13/ tam ātma.doṣa.tyāgena para.śakty.aparādha.vaśena vā sādhayet //
GS38kautil_u:6756: KAZ09.3.14/ mahā.aparādhe^api purohite samrodhanam avasrāvaṇaṃ vā siddhiḥ,
GS38kautil_u:6757: yuva.rāje samrodhanaṃ nigraho vā guṇavaty anyasmin sati putre //
GS38kautil_u:6758: KAZ09.3.15/ putraṃ bhrātaram anyaṃ vā kulyaṃ rāja.grāhiṇam utsāhena
GS38kautil_u:6761: KAZ09.3.16/ anyebhyas tad.vidhebhyo vā bhūmi.dānair viśvāsayed enam //
GS38kautil_u:6762: KAZ09.3.17/ tad.viśiṣṭaṃ svayaṃ.grāhaṃ daṇḍaṃ vā preṣayet,
GS38kautil_u:6764: KAZ09.3.18/ aparuddha.ādānaṃ pāragrāmikaṃ vā yogam ātiṣṭhet //
GS38kautil_u:6774: KAZ09.3.25/ mitreṇa^upagrāhayed vā yathā na^amitraṃ gacchet //
GS38kautil_u:6775: KAZ09.3.26/ amitrād vā sattrī bhedayed enaṃ - “ayaṃ tvā yoga.puruṣaṃ
GS38kautil_u:6776: manyamāno bhartary eva vikramayiṣyati, avāpta.artho daṇḍa.cāriṇam
GS38kautil_u:6777: amitra.āṭavikeṣu kṛcchre vā prayāse yokṣyati, viputra.dāram ante vā vāsayiṣyati //
GS38kautil_u:6778: KAZ09.3.27/ pratihata.vikramaṃ tvāṃ bhartary paṇyaṃ kariṣyati, tvayā vā saṃdhiṃ kṛtvā bhartāram eva prasādayiṣyati //
GS38kautil_u:6779: KAZ09.3.28/ mitram upakṛṣṭaṃ vā^asya gaccha” iti //
GS38kautil_u:6781: KAZ09.3.30/ apratipannasya saṃśrayaṃ bhedayed “asau te yoga.puruṣaḥ
GS38kautil_u:6783: KAZ09.3.31/ sattrī ca^enam abhityakta.śāsanair ghātayet, gūḍha.puruṣair vā
GS38kautil_u:6788: KAZ09.3.35/ parasya ca^enān kopān utthāpayet, ātmanaś ca śamayet //
GS38kautil_u:6789: KAZ09.3.36/ yaḥ kopaṃ kartuṃ śamayituṃ vā śaktas tatra^upajāpaḥ kāryaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:6790: KAZ09.3.37/ yaḥ satya.saṃdhaḥ śaktaḥ karmaṇi phala.avāptau ca^anugrahītuṃ
GS38kautil_u:6791: vinipāte ca trātuṃ tatra pratijāpaḥ kāryaḥ, tarkayitavyaś ca kalyāṇa.buddhir uta^aho śaṭha iti //
GS38kautil_u:6792: KAZ09.3.38/ śaṭho hi bāhyo^abhyantaram evam upajapati - “bhartāraṃ cedd hatvā māṃ pratipādayiṣyati śatru.vadho bhūmi.lābhaś ca me dvividho lābho
GS38kautil_u:6793: bhaviṣyati, atha vā śatrur enam āhaniṣyati^iti hata.bandhu.pakṣas
GS38kautil_u:6794: tulya.doṣa.daṇḍena^udvignaś ca me bhūyān akṛtya.pakṣo bhaviṣyati,
GS38kautil_u:6795: tad.vidhe vā^anyasminn api śaṅkito bhaviṣyati, anyam anyaṃ ca^asya mukhyam
GS38kautil_u:6797: KAZ09.3.39/ abhyantaro vā śaṭho bāhyam evam upajapati - “kośam asya
GS38kautil_u:6798: hariṣyāmi, daṇḍaṃ vā^asya haniṣyāmi, duṣṭaṃ vā bhartāram anena
GS38kautil_u:6800: asya sajyatām, vairam asya prasajyatām, tataḥ sva.adhīno me bhaviṣyati,
GS38kautil_u:6801: tato bhartāram eva prasādayiṣyāmi, svayaṃ vā rājyaṃ grahīṣyāmiṇ” baddhvā vā bāhya.bhūmiṃ
GS38kautil_u:6802: bhartṛ.bhūmiṃ ca^ubhayam avāpsyāmi, viruddhaṃ vā^āvāhayitvā bāhyaṃ viśvastaṃ ghātayiṣyāmi, śūnyaṃ vā^asya mūlaṃ hariṣyāmi” iti //
GS38kautil_u:6803: KAZ09.3.40/ kalyāṇa.buddhis tu saha.jīvy artham upajapati //
GS38kautil_u:6806: KAZ09.3.42ab/ evam upalabhya - pare parebhyaḥ sve svebhyaḥ sve parebhyaḥ
GS38kautil_u:6808: KAZ09.3.42cd/ rakṣyāḥ svebhyaḥ parebhyaś ca nityam ātmā vipaścitā //E
GS38kautil_u:6813: KAZ09.4.04/ ādeyaḥ pratyādeyaḥ prasādakaḥ prakopako hrasva.kālas
GS38kautil_u:6814: tanu.kṣayo^alpa.vyayo mahān vṛddhy.udayaḥ kalyo dharmyaḥ purogaś ca^iti
GS38kautil_u:6816: KAZ09.4.05/ suprāpya.anupālyaḥ pareṣām apratyādeya ity ādeyaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:6818: KAZ09.4.07/ tam ādadānas tatrastho vā vināśaṃ prāpnoti //

GS38kautil_u:7146: KAZ10.2.11/ abhūmiṣṭhānāṃ hi sva.bhūmiṣṭhā yuddhe pratilomā bhavanti //
GS38kautil_u:7147: KAZ10.2.12/ yojanam adhamā, adhyardhaṃ madhyamā, dvi.yojanam uttamā,
GS38kautil_u:7149: KAZ10.2.13/ āśraya.kārī sampanna.ghātī pārṣṇir āsāro madhyama udāsīno vā pratikartavyaḥ, saṃkaṭo mārgaḥ śodhayitavyaḥ, kośo daṇḍo mitra.amitra.aṭavī.balaṃ viṣṭi.ṛtur vā pratīkṣyāḥ,
GS38kautil_u:7151: mitra.bala.nirvedaś ca^āgamiṣyati, upajapitāro vā na^atitvarayanti, śatrur abhiprāyaṃ vā pūrayiṣyati, iti śanair yāyāt,
GS38kautil_u:7155: KAZ10.2.15/ tīrtha.abhigrahe hasty.aśvair anyato rātrāv uttārya sattraṃ gṛhṇīyāt //
GS38kautil_u:7161: eka.ayana.mārge śaila.viṣame saṃkaṭe vā bahulī.bhūtaṃ niveśe prasthite visamnāhaṃ bhojana.vyāsaktam āyata.gata.pariśrāntam avasuptaṃ
GS38kautil_u:7163: vyādhita.patty.aśva.dvipam abhūmiṣṭhaṃ vā bala.vyasaneṣu vā sva.sainyaṃ
GS38kautil_u:7170: KAZ10.2.20cd/ sva.bhumau pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā yudhyeta niviśeta ca //E
GS38kautil_u:7175: KAZ10.3.03/ bala.vyasana.avaskanda.kāleṣu param abhihanyāt, abhūmiṣṭhaṃ vā sva.bhūmiṣṭhaḥ, prakṛti.pragraho vā sva.bhūmiṣṭham //

GS38kautil_u:7179: KAZ10.3.06/ pūrvaṃ bhaṅga.pradānena^anupralīnaṃ bhinnam abhinnaḥ pratinivṛtya hanyāt //
GS38kautil_u:7180: KAZ10.3.07/ purastād abhihatya pracalaṃ vimukhaṃ vā pṛṣṭhato
GS38kautil_u:7182: KAZ10.3.08/ pṛṣṭhato^abhihatyā pracalaṃ vimukhaṃ vā purastāt
GS38kautil_u:7189: KAZ10.3.14/ dūṣya.amitra.aṭavī.balair vā pūrvaṃ yodhayitvā śrāntam aśrāntaḥ param abhihanyāt
GS38kautil_u:7190: KAZ10.3.15/ dūṣya.balena vā svayaṃ bhaṅgaṃ dattvā “jitam” iti viśvastam aviśvastaḥ sattra.apāśrayo^abhihanyāt
GS38kautil_u:7193: KAZ10.3.17/ phalgu.bala.avacchanna.sāra.balo vā para.vīrān anupraviśya hanyāt //

GS38kautil_u:7196: KAZ10.3.19/ rātrāv avaskandena jāgarayitvā nidrā.klāntān avasuptān vā divā

GS38kautil_u:7200: KAZ10.3.22/ śuṣka.carma.vṛtta.śarkara.ākośakair go.mahiṣa.uṣṭra.yūthair vā trasnubhir akṛta.hasty.aśvaṃ bhinnam abhinnaḥ pratinivṛttaṃ hanyāt //
GS38kautil_u:7202: KAZ10.3.24/ dhānvana.vana.saṃkaṭa.paṅka.śaila.nimna.viṣama.nāvo gāvaḥ śakaṭavyūho nīhāro rātrir iti sattrāṇi //
GS38kautil_u:7205: KAZ10.3.27/ saṃhatya daṇḍaṃ brūyāt “tulya.vetano^asmi, bhavadbhiḥ saha bhogyam idaṃ rājyam, mayā^abhihitaiḥ paro^abhihantavyaḥ” iti //
GS38kautil_u:7206: KAZ10.3.28/ vedeṣv apy anuśrūyate samāpta.dakṣiṇānāṃ yajñānām avabhṛtheṣu “sā te gatir yā śūrāṇām” iti //

GS38kautil_u:7210: KAZ10.3.30cd/ kṣaṇena tān apy atiyānti śūrāḥ prāṇān suyuddheṣu parityajantaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:7213: KAZ10.3.31cd/ tat tasya mā bhūn narakaṃ ca gacched yo bhartṛ.piṇḍasya kṛte na yudhyet - iti

GS38kautil_u:7236: sāhasro^aśva.vadhaḥ, śatyaḥ patti.mukhya.vadhaḥ, śiro viṃśatikaṃ bhoga.dvaiguṇyaṃ svayaṃ.grāhaś ca” iti //

GS38kautil_u:7261: daraṇa.hīnā ca ratha.bhūmiḥ, hasty.aśvayor manuṣyāṇāṃ ca same viṣame hitā yuddhe niveśe ca //

GS38kautil_u:7300: KAZ10.5.03/ śama.antaraṃ pattiṃ sthāpayet, tri.śama.antaram aśvam,
GS38kautil_u:7305: KAZ10.5.07/ tasmin dhanvinaṃ sthāpayet, tri.dhanuṣy aśvam, pañca.dhanuṣi
GS38kautil_u:7309: KAZ10.5.10/ pañca.daśa rathasya hastino vā, pañca ca^aśvāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:7311: KAZ10.5.12/ trīṇi trikāṇy anīkaṃ rathānām urasyaṃ sthāpayet, tāvat kakṣaṃ pakṣaṃ ca^ubhayataḥ
GS38kautil_u:7312: KAZ10.5.13/ pañca.catvāriṃśad evaṃ rathā ratha.vyūhe bhavanti, dve śate pañca.viṃśatiś ca^aśvāḥ, ṣaṭ.śatāni pañca.saptatiś ca puruṣāḥ pratiyodhāraḥ, tāvantaḥ pāda.gopāḥ //
GS38kautil_u:7314: KAZ10.5.15/ tasya dvi.ratha.uttarā vṛddhir ā.eka.viṃśati.rathād iti //
GS38kautil_u:7315: KAZ10.5.16/ evam ojā daśa sama.vyūha.prakṛtayo bhavanti //
GS38kautil_u:7317: KAZ10.5.18/ tasya^api dvi.ratha^uttarā vṛddhir ā.eka.viṃśati.rathād iti //
GS38kautil_u:7318: KAZ10.5.19/ evam ojā daśa viṣama.vyūha.prakṛtayo bhavanti //
GS38kautil_u:7319: KAZ10.5.20/ ataḥ sainyānāṃ vyūha.śeṣam āvāpaḥ kāryaḥ //

GS38kautil_u:7321: KAZ10.5.22/ evaṃ tri.bhāga.ūno rathānām āvāpaḥ kāryaḥ //

GS38kautil_u:7329: KAZ10.5.29/ para.āvāpāt pratyāvāpāc ca catur.guṇād ā.aṣṭa.guṇād iti vā vibhavataḥ sainyānām āvāpaḥ //
GS38kautil_u:7331: KAZ10.5.31/ vyāmiśro vā hasti.ratha.aśvānāṃ - cakra.anteṣu hastinaḥ pārśvayor aśvā rathā urasye

GS38kautil_u:7476: “amuṣya rājñaḥ putras tvam, śatru.bhayād iha nyasto^asi” iti //

GS38kautil_u:7500: KAZ11.1.49/ kārtāntika.vyañjano vā kanyām anyena vṛtām anyasya prarūpayet
GS38kautil_u:7501: “amuṣya kanyā rāja.patnī rāja.prasavinī ca bhaviṣyati, sarva.svena

GS38kautil_u:7505_1: bhayāl lekhyam ābharaṇaṃ gṛhītvā^āgatā^asmi, nirdoṣā te bhāryā, gūḍham asmin pratikartavyam, aham api tāvat pratipatsyāmi”

GS38kautil_u:7547: KAZ12.1.28/ tīkṣṇa.balaṃ vā^asmai dadyād yad avamānitaṃ vikurvīta, maulam anuraktaṃ vā yad asya vyasane^apakuryāt //

GS38kautil_u:7555: KAZ12.2.01/ sa cet saṃdhau na^avatiṣṭheta, brūyād enaṃ - “ime

GS38kautil_u:7558: KAZ12.2.03/ mitra.mukhā hy amitrās te ye tvā sāhasam adharmam
GS38kautil_u:7560: KAZ12.2.04/ śūrais tyakta.ātmabhiḥ saha yoddhuṃ sāhasam, jana.kṣayam
GS38kautil_u:7561: ubhayataḥ kartum adharmaḥ, dṛṣṭam arthaṃ mitram aduṣṭaṃ ca tyaktum
GS38kautil_u:7563: KAZ12.2.05/ mitravāṃś ca sa rājā, bhūyaś ca^etena^arthena mitrāṇy udyojayiṣyati yāni tvā sarvato^abhiyāsyanti
GS38kautil_u:7564: KAZ12.2.06/ na ca madhyama.udāsīnayor maṇḍalasya vā parityaktaḥ, bhavāṃs tu parityaktaḥ yattvā samudyuktam upaprekṣante “bhūyaḥ kṣaya.vyayābhyāṃ
GS38kautil_u:7565: yujyatām, mitrāc ca bhidyatām, atha^enaṃ parityakta.mūlaṃ
GS38kautil_u:7567: KAZ12.2.07/ sa bhavān na^arhati mitra.mukhānām amitrāṇāṃ śrotum, mitrāṇy udvejayitum amitrāṃś ca śreyasā yoktum, prāṇa.saṃśayam anarthaṃ
GS38kautil_u:7569: KAZ12.2.08/ tathā^api pratiṣṭhamānasya prakṛti.kopam asya kārayed yathā
GS38kautil_u:7572: KAZ12.2.10/ yad uktam ātma.rakṣitake rakṣyaṃ tatra tīkṣṇān rasadāṃś ca prayuñjīta //

GS38kautil_u:7583: KAZ12.2.17/ siddhe subhagāyā apy enaṃ yogam upadiśet
GS38kautil_u:7588: KAZ12.2.20/ bhāryām asya bhikṣukī “rāja.patnī rāja.prasavinī vā
GS38kautil_u:7590: KAZ12.2.21/ bhāryā.vyañjanā vā mahā.mātraṃ brūyāt “rājā kila mām avarodhayiṣyati, tava^antikāya pattra.lekhyam ābharaṇaṃ ca^idaṃ
GS38kautil_u:7594: KAZ12.2.23/ tad asya vaidehaka.vyañjanaḥ pratisaṃdadhyāt, kārya.siddhiṃ ca brūyāt //
GS38kautil_u:7595: KAZ12.2.24/ evam ekena dvābhyāṃ tribhir ity upāyair eka.ekam asya

GS38kautil_u:7621: KAZ12.3.04/ ye ca^apravāsitās tān sattriṇo brūyuḥ “etat tad yad asmābhiḥ
GS38kautil_u:7623: KAZ12.3.05/ yebhyaś ca rājā yācito na dadāti tān sattriṇo brūyuḥ - “uktaḥ
GS38kautil_u:7624: śūnya.pālo rājñā “ayācyam artham asau ca^asau ca mā yācate, mayā pratyākhyātāḥ śatru.saṃhitāḥ, teṣām uddharaṇe prayatasva” iti //
GS38kautil_u:7626: KAZ12.3.07/ yebhyaś ca rājā yācito dadāti tān sattriṇo brūyuḥ - “uktaḥ
GS38kautil_u:7627: śūnya.pālo rājñā “ayācyam artham asau ca^asau ca mā yācate, tebhyo mayā so^artho viśvāsa.arthaṃ dattaḥ, śatru.saṃhitāḥ, teṣām uddharaṇe prayatasva” iti //
GS38kautil_u:7629: KAZ12.3.09/ ye ca^enaṃ yācyam arthaṃ na yācante tān sattriṇo brūyuḥ -
GS38kautil_u:7630: “uktaḥ śūnya.pālo rājñā “yācyam artham asau ca^asau ca mā na yācate, kim anyat sva.doṣa.śaṅkitatvāt, teṣām uddharaṇe prayatasva” iti //

GS38kautil_u:7640: KAZ12.3.16/ tat.kulīnam aparuddhaṃ vā hiraṇyena pratilobhya brūyāt “antar.balaṃ pratyanta.skandham antaṃ vā^asya pramṛdnīhi” iti //

GS38kautil_u:7678: KAZ12.4.16/ lubdhaka.vyañjanā vā vyāla.mṛgān pañjarebhyaḥ pramuñceyuḥ,
GS38kautil_u:7679: sarpa.grāhā vā sarpān ugra.viṣān, hasti.jīvino vā hastinaḥ //

GS38kautil_u:7688: KAZ12.4.22/ rāja.āvāsam anupraviṣṭā vā saṃkuleṣu rājānaṃ hanyuḥ //

GS38kautil_u:7702: KAZ12.4.29cd/ amitram atisaṃdadhyāt saktam uktāsu bhūmiṣu //E
GS38kautil_u:7709: KAZ12.5.04/ śilā.śastra.varṣam uttama.āgārāt, kapāṭam avapātitaṃ vā,
GS38kautil_u:7713: gandha.udaka.prasekena vā rasam aticārayet, puṣpa.cūrṇa.upahāreṇa vā //
GS38kautil_u:7714: KAZ12.5.07/ gandha.praticchannaṃ vā^asya tīkṣṇaṃ dhūmam atinayet //
GS38kautil_u:7717: KAZ12.5.09/ pratyāsanne vā^amitre jana.padāj janam avarodha.kṣamam
GS38kautil_u:7719: KAZ12.5.10/ durgāc ca^anavarodha.kṣamam apanayet, pratyādeyam ari.viṣayaṃ
GS38kautil_u:7725: KAZ12.5.14/ udakāni ca dūṣayet, avasrāvayec ca //
GS38kautil_u:7727: KAZ12.5.16/ suruṅgām amitra.sthāne bahu.mukhīṃ kṛtvā nicaya.mukhyān
GS38kautil_u:7729: KAZ12.5.17/ para.prayuktāyāṃ vā suruṅgāyāṃ parikhām udaka.antikīṃ

GS38kautil_u:7734: KAZ12.5.20/ madhye bhittvā dhūmam udakaṃ vā prayacchet //
GS38kautil_u:7735: KAZ12.5.21/ prativihita.durgo vā mūle dāyād kṛtvā pratilomām asya diśaṃ
GS38kautil_u:7736: gacchet, yato vā mitrair bandhubhir āṭavikair vā saṃsṛjyeta
GS38kautil_u:7737: parasya^amitrair dūṣyair vā mahadbhiḥ, yato vā gato^asya mitrair viyogaṃ kuryāt pārṣṇiṃ vā gṛhṇīyāt rājyaṃ vā^asya hārayet vīvadha.āsāra.prasārān
GS38kautil_u:7738: vā vārayet, yato vā śaknuyād ākṣikavad apakṣepeṇa^asya prahartum, yato vā svaṃ rājyaṃ trāyeta mūlasya^upacayaṃ vā kuryāt //
GS38kautil_u:7739: KAZ12.5.22/ yataḥ saṃdhim abhipretaṃ labheta tato vā gacchet //
GS38kautil_u:7740: KAZ12.5.23/ saha.prasthāyino vā^asya preṣayeyuḥ “ayaṃ te śatrur asmākaṃ
GS38kautil_u:7741: hasta.gataḥ, paṇyaṃ viprakāraṃ vā^apadiśya hiraṇyam antaḥ.sāra.balaṃ ca preṣaya yasya^enam arpayema baddhaṃ pravāsitaṃ vā” iti //

GS38kautil_u:8436: KAZ14.3.81/ teṣv anna.pāna.bhājanāni nyastāni na kṣīyante //

GS38kautil_u:8469: KAZ14.4.13ab/ tūryāṇāṃ taiḥ praliptānāṃ śabdo viṣa.vināśanaḥ /

GS38kautil_u:8484: pūrva.ācāryaiḥ prasthāpitāni prāyaśas tāni saṃhṛtya^ekam idam

GS38kautil_u:8563: KAZ15.1.71ab/ evaṃ śāstram idaṃ yuktam etābhis tantra.yuktibhiḥ /
